duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage day-to-day operations of the store, ensuring excellent customer care and service.
Mentor and coach team members to optimize processes and drive sales through exceptional customer service.
Analyze and manage P&L reports, as well as inventory logs to maximize profitability.
Uphold cash and bank depository procedures to maintain financial security.
Foster a customer-centric culture and exceed customer experience goals.
Manage tasks and supervise team members in the absence of the Store Manager.

education_certification.credential: H.S. Diploma or General Education Degree (GED) is required
